transcript:
Executive: Hello, theek hai? Palak mam. 
Haa Riya ji mai ye bol rahi thi ki aapne jaise abhi 9696 pe call kiya tha to hamare pass ek concern open ho gaya tha. Aap ye cheez samajh gaye sir kaise uthana hai. 
Hanji to mai isi ke liye maine aapko connect kiya hai. To matlab abhi aapko TrustSeal regarding aapke certificate regarding maine bata diya usme abhi bhi 10 to 15 days lagenge. Abhi 11 days hua hai aapke is service ko laaye hue. Kyunki 31 ko hamara connect hua tha aapko bhi yaad hoga. 
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: To mam abhi aur kitna time lag jayega exact?
Customer: Mam dekhiye mostly process me kya rehta hai ki 10 to 15 days lagta hai.
Executive: Theek hai. 
Customer: Theek hai to matlab 20 tak mam aa jayega 20 tak?
Executive: A most probably 20 tak aa jayega. Mai agar jo bhi hota hai aapke pass dekhiye mail pe update aa jayegi. And mere pass update aa jayegi to mai aapko bata dungi. Theek hai aapke pass abhi vessel certificate to hai na aapke online to abhi chal raha hai. Live wala. 
Customer: Hai but mam actually ye hai na customer aate hain visit pe to thoda office ka impression dikhane ke liye thoda hona chahiye na to isliye thoda jaldi ho rahi hai. 
Executive: Nahi nahi wo aapka aa jaye wo aapka ho jayega till then aap ye kar sakte hain aapke pass jo online certificates hain usko aap apne status vagarah pe laga sakte hain just agar aapko trust banana hai. Uska aap copy nikal lijiye apne tak. 
Customer: Mam to aap mujhe bhej dijiyega mujhe pata nahi hai kaun sa kya nikalna hai.
Executive: Wo mai wo mai bhej dungi aapko. 
Customer: Theek hai mam. 
Executive: Wo online wala aap apne us pe laga sakte ho. Mam kya mujhe aap pdf send kar dijiye mam mai nikalwa lungi.
Executive: Haan mai pdf aapko send kar deti hu till then. Theek hai and abhi ke liye concern jo tha mai close kar du kyuki mere pass concern aa jata hai. Iska feedback hota hai ki hamara aapka connect ho gaya hai na aapka resolution ho gaya hai.
Customer: Okay mam okay okay okay.
Executive: Theek hai and thank you mam. Theek hai and and maine aapko pehle bhi bataya agar aapko kahin bhi koi bhi problem hota hai koi bhi baat karna hota hai to aapko mujhse hi connect karna hai. 
Customer: Okay. 
Executive: 9696 pe ha palak mam mera number aapke pass hai hi personal bhi. 
Customer: Theek hai mam ha ha mam save hai okay. 
Executive: Haan to theek hai mam aap pdf bas send kar dijiye mai fir wahi tab tak dekhti hu theek hai. 
Customer: Haan kyuki mere hum jahan bhi call karoge like 9696 pe ya kahin bhi. 
Executive: All do call mere pass bhi aayegi and mai hi aapka issue resolve karungi isse acha hai mujhe personal pe call kar lena. 
Customer: Okay okay thank you mam thank you. 
Executive: Okay theek hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants TrustSeal certificate urgently.

Resolution:

- Executive assured certificate will arrive by 20th.
- Executive suggested using online certificate in status.
- Executive agreed to send the PDF of the certificate.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send the PDF of certificate.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, certificate, pdf, delivery time
